TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMCBUTTON extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 包含用來在工具列上建立按鈕的值。

span.span: Contains values that are used to create buttons on a toolbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用 MMCBUTTON 結構和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 進行程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the MMCBUTTON structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
